original: intros P R H. unfold stable in H. inversion H; subst. intros. apply stable0. intros a H1. apply H0 in H1. apply Cb_id with (a:=a) in H1. apply Cb_trans with (a:=a) in H1; auto. intros a H2. apply H1 in H2. apply Cb_id with (a:=a) in H2. apply Cb_trans with (a:=a) in H2; auto. apply H2. apply H3. apply H0. inversion H; subst. intros a H1. apply H in H1. apply Cb_id with (a:=a) in H1. apply Cb_trans with (a:=a) in H1; auto. intros a H2. apply H1 in H2. apply Cb_id with (a:=a) in H2. apply Cb_trans with (a:=a) in H2; auto. apply H2. apply H3.
